item.title: markdown starter template
item.dc:creator: Karim Cassam ChenaÃ¯
item.content:encoded:
Syntax Cheatsheet:

Phrase Emphasis

italic bold italic bold

Links

Inline:

An example Reference-style labels (titles are optional): An example. Then, anywhere else in the doc, define the link:

Images

Inline (titles are optional):

Reference-style:

Headers

Setext-style:

Header 1

Header 2

atx-style (closing #’s are optional):

Header 1

Header 2

Header 6

Lists

Ordered, without paragraphs:

  1. Foo
  2. Bar

Unordered, with paragraphs:

  • A list item.

    With multiple paragraphs.

  • Bar

    You can nest them:

  • Abacus
    • answer
  • Bubbles
    1. bunk
    2. bupkis
      • BELITTLER
    3. burper
  • Cunning

    Blockquotes

    Email-style angle brackets are used for blockquotes.

And, they can be nested.

Headers in blockquotes

  • You can quote a list.
  • Etc.

    Code Spans

    `
